content.question: The developments illustrated by the poster were most directly motivated by the spread of

choices.label: Marxist concepts of class conflict, which inspired revolutionary movements
nationalism, which led to heightened conflict between ethnic groups
anarchist political ideology, which led to attacks on the structures of governmental authority in terror campaigns
resistance to European overseas empires by colonized peoples

content.answer: nationalism, which led to heightened conflict between ethnic groups

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
